snippet: A court on Thursday confirmed an earlier ruling to reduce the prison sentence of Platon A. Lebedev, a former business partner of the oil tycoon Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky.
abstract: Russian court confirms ruling to reduce prison sentence of Platon A Lebedev, former business partner of oil tycoon Mikhail B Khodorkovsky; many believe men's prosecution on tax evasion and other charges relates to their opposition to Pres Vladimir V Putin.
lead_paragraph: A court on Thursday confirmed an earlier ruling to reduce the prison sentence of Platon A. Lebedev, a former business partner of the oil tycoon Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky.

headline.seo: Russia: Court Reduces Sentence for Tycoon’s Partner
headline.main: Russia: Court Reduces Sentence for Tycoon’s Partner
headline.print_headline: Russia: Court Reduces Sentence for Tycoon’s Partner
